column3: “WOW!  Now I know what people mean when they say top shelf".  It has taken me about 20 minutes to write this review.  NOT FOR A BEGINNER!!!!!”"

“Wow!  This strain rocks!  
I've smoked it in an enclosed area as well as outdoors in nature.  Both times I had a blast! 

I was researching about something, and decided to have a puff.  I immediately felt intrigued and motivated about the topic I was researching; I felt focused, uplifted, creative, and passionate about what I was doing.  

I also smoked this on the beach and outdoors in the forest. It was an awesome ...”

“This has to be on of the best Strains I have ever had. This sweet, and potent, flavour takes care of my ADHD/OCD & chronic pain with ease. Leaving my mind to it's creative and scientific vices with an astute focus that is, so far; paralleled by None. Northern Lights #5 is definitely a Strain to be reckoned with...”

“Good ol' Northen Lights #5. One of my personal favorites merely because of taste. Sooo Sooo Unique. Very nice head high with an accompanying body high. Lit up a bowl tonight and remembered why I loved it so much. Stimulates creativity very nicely! If you ever see a nice batch of NL #5 GET IT. Thats all I have to say.”

“Vaped about 300 mg. Nice kind of citrus earthy smell. Add a hint of cool pine and you got the taste, smooth almost all the way to the end.  *Excellent pain relief, and on a day it was most needed*. Nice indica head effects, kind of day-dreamy in a comedic kind of way.  Melted into a tub of hot water and listened to music while my thoughts floated away and my body pain dissolved into the bath. Some moments, music was ...”

“I am still pretty new to using marijuana for medical purposes. I have a hard time finding products that do not cause difficult negative effects along with the positive. Some help my pain, but make my anxiety go off the charts, others calm me, but don’t help my pain.

But this strain has changed EVERYTHING for me! It makes my pain melt away, I feel happy and light hearted and my anxiety disappears. Plus, despite being...”

“Easily my second favorite bud(AK-47 being my first). Very intense high, almost trippy in a way. Really messed with my concentration. Perfect little buds. Smoked some of this when I was a delivery driver, went to turn around in a driveway only to find out it wasn't a driveway at all, just some family's front yard! Lucky that was my last delivery for the day.....”

“Purchased this strain from the Cresco Yeltrah (CY) dispensary in Butler, PA. This was listed as a Reserve" strain on their menu and cost $15 more than the other 500 mg CO2 cartridges. I hesitated initially due in large part to the price difference. My line of reasoning was
column4: "How much better could this strain really be?"
column5: and "Is it really worth a nearly 20% premium when this stuff is already expensive enough?" Brass...”"

column3: “Purchased this strain from the Cresco Yeltrah (CY) dispensary in Butler, PA. This was listed as a Reserve" strain on their menu and cost $15 more than the other 500 mg CO2 cartridges. I hesitated initially due in large part to the price difference. My line of reasoning was
column4: "How much better could this strain really be?"
column5: and "Is it really worth a nearly 20% premium when this stuff is already expensive enough?" Brass...”"

column3: “I tried this for the first time a couple months ago and since then I've made it a point to buy this strain atleast twice a month. It is the best hybrid I've come across so far. I smoke it before work and it puts me in a uplifted mood. At night the strain puts me in a relaxed mood, ready for bed whenever I choose to. And last, this flower is very beautiful. It's very dense, red fibers wrapped around it, and the crysta...”

“mm dank smelling, sweet pine, flowery, and a bit oaky! Packed 1/2 a bowl and I couldn't even finish, first hit got me high... very light and smooth smoke. Hits heavy, be safe when using this strain. Tastes like sweet pine, flowers, and mineral/dirt. Helped my tendon pain 5/5, dislocated ribs 4/5, neuropathy 5/5, scar tissue pain 2/5, inflammation 5/5, and I felt super chill 5/5, however it hasn't helped with mental a...”

“Amazing strain. My absolute favourite. Great for depression. Personally, it makes me feel like a kid on Christmas morning. The colours are brighter, the sounds are crisper, all of a sudden life is okay and I'm just happy to be a part of it. It's great for pulling me out of a dark (or ambivalent) headspace. 

Also, one of the only strains that makes me want to be adventuring outside, rather than curl up under a blanke...”

“I smoked some Northern Lights - Five Star General" I bought at One Draw Two probably six months ago.  My blood pressure went down from 160/110 to 128/82 within a half hour. Dosage was perhaps 1/20th of a gram. I was skeptical of all the reports on the Internet about marijuana lowering blood pressure because the legitimate medical web sites are not emphasizing it. So I bought my own blood pressure monitor and am expe...”"

“Lol nl5 is my favorite of all, the high last soooo long , only downside is, after the peak high u get crazy munchies .. I ate so much my stomach was killing me for the whole other day... Other then that's it's legit af and amazing”
“Easily my favorite strand of all time. My top three are Northern Lights, Purple Frost, and Blue Dream. Gotta love everything about this bud.”

“This is my favorite strain. Even though it is not the best, it tastes great, gives me no negative side effects, and gets me high as hell.  When I smoke this stuff, I feel like making all kinds of stuff like bongs, pipes, steamrollers, and even get creative with joints like cross and diamond joints.  I made a bong out of a supersoaker that we called The Shotgun" while on this.  Incredible stuff

“I mistakenly actually wrote this review on the regular northern lights I now realize that the strain was actually this one so please disregard that previous review. ... Now Going in anxious and stressed - First thing you notice is happiness and I’ll be honest it doesn’t hurt that the exact second that I took this damn the nearest popped up on the screen that LeBron James signed with the Los Angeles Lakers my favorite...”
“YES MATE”

“Northern lights #5 x Silver Haze most likely from Sensi seed.  Very vigorous grower, can handle as much fertilizer you can give it without paranoia of nute burn or plant death.  Lush, deep green, almost Burgundy vegetation, medium long internodes, airy, almost tootsie roll smelling buds.  Did well with daily bending and stalk breaking, awesome fungus and mold fighting ability.  Long vegetative time, 90 days.  Short b...”
“High was very average. Nothing special at all whatsoever. I got this weed and from my local dispensary and it was okay". In fact it was claimed to help PTSD and Anxiety
column6: and very unenjoyable Panic Attack after taking first couple hits
column7: once this was no longer an option I had to take a xanax 1mg football to calm down. After smoking succeeding the past insident
column8: I was able to enjoyably get ...”"

column3: “This one hits you immediately when vaped. I felt very uplifted and productive, but still had a heavy euphoric feeling in the head and body. Most indicas put me to sleep, but this is the perfect daytime remedy to curve any anxiety and feel relaxed for hours!”
“Don't understand what happened to me. Completely blown away. Actually passed out from the herb. Amazing taste, extremely heavy strain, I would give it an eleven if I could.”

“The couch lock is real with this one.  Holy smokes.  

I took this for my severe insomnia and I swear I have never had such refreshing sleeps in my life.  

Not only that, but my friends noticed (not me, I was too high) that I calmed down completely and was able to converse without pacing or getting derailed/stuttering (a symptom of my anxiety).

I will continue to buy and smoke this amazing, tasty strain.”
“My favorite strain hands down, the high the taste the smell are all just so damn good. NL #5 has never let me down! Great for pain, stress,  insomnia, depression!”
“This is the bomb diggity of weed for me.  Such a wonderful dimension shifting high.”
“High was very average. Nothing special at all whatsoever. I got this weed and from my local dispensary and it was okay". In fact it was claimed to help PTSD and Anxiety
column6: and very unenjoyable Panic Attack after taking first couple hits
column7: once this was no longer an option I had to take a xanax 1mg football to calm down. After smoking succeeding the past insident
column8: I was able to enjoyably get ...”"

column3: “Northern lights #5 x Silver Haze most likely from Sensi seed.  Very vigorous grower, can handle as much fertilizer you can give it without paranoia of nute burn or plant death.  Lush, deep green, almost Burgundy vegetation, medium long internodes, airy, almost tootsie roll smelling buds.  Did well with daily bending and stalk breaking, awesome fungus and mold fighting ability.  Long vegetative time, 90 days.  Short b...”
“This strain is a creeper for sure, had half a bowl, and I was straight for a good two hours, I definitally reccomend this for those with anxiety/stress.”
“Top 5 List...!!”
“This is a fantastic strain. I struggle with chronic pain and this definitely kills it. Gives me a smooth, relaxed high without the couch lock.”
“Smells strong, smokes quite smooth, tastes very pleasant.  It is a clear headed body stone high. Similar to other good indicas such as hindu kush.”
“I feel like Gumby. NL#5 is a bestowed treasure from the cannabis Gods. Swift action, great body buzz, mind expanding, definitely my new favorite. Gonna chow now and watch some space stuff.”

“This strain is one of the best. It just smokes so damn easy. I can take hit after hit, then just fly! This is perfect for hanging out with friends; you'll want to chat, hang out, and go through giggle fits together. You will get thirsty and you WILL get the munchies.”

“What a fantastic strain...
Mmm, this one is nice, very fruity and citrus at the same time. There's a sweet quality to the buds. 
The smoke is thick and tastey. Very nice fresh fruity cirtus taste too. There is a hashy after taste that is very earthy and gives off an onion/funky taste...

I love this one because it's not too complex; it is what it is, sour fruity goodness.”

“I don't know if I like this strain to be honest. I have had this strain now for two days. The first smoke off the sack had me feeling happy, talkative, hungry, creative, and I even spaced out for about 15 minutes day dreaming. It was a really good stone that crept in slowly and leveled out at a 6/10 potency. The next day I smoked a bowl and I found myself couch locked, sleepy, and spacey. The come down leaves me feel...”
“Personal favorite.  Makes me want to take a bike ride or rock out.”
“I feel like Gumby. NL#5 is a bestowed treasure from the cannabis Gods. Swift action, great body buzz, mind expanding, definitely my new favorite. Gonna chow now and watch some space stuff.”
“Top 5 List...!!”

“The first thing I noticed [as I loaded the 'reserve live resin from  [Mapleglenn Dispensary] about Northern Lights #5 was a slight fizzy Pepsi taste. Smooth smoking and fresh fruity citrus smell and taste also. It took  a few minutes before the effects came on, and did it  ever. A head and chest excitement like waiting for an old friend or relative you haven't seen in a while. Then the sensation of full body euphoria...”

“Amazing for dealing with stress, anxiety, and inflammation. Helps wonderfully with my IBS. Great body high and a calming head high but doesn't make you so sleepy that you'll pass out right away. Music sounds amazing. Just generally feel really good and happy, carefree.”
“I feel like Gumby. NL#5 is a bestowed treasure from the cannabis Gods. Swift action, great body buzz, mind expanding, definitely my new favorite. Gonna chow now and watch some space stuff.”
“Smells strong, smokes quite smooth, tastes very pleasant.  It is a clear headed body stone high. Similar to other good indicas such as hindu kush.”
“Top 5 List...!!”

“I don't know if I like this strain to be honest. I have had this strain now for two days. The first smoke off the sack had me feeling happy, talkative, hungry, creative, and I even spaced out for about 15 minutes day dreaming. It was a really good stone that crept in slowly and leveled out at a 6/10 potency. The next day I smoked a bowl and I found myself couch locked, sleepy, and spacey. The come down leaves me feel...”

“I wasn’t expecting a lot from this strain as many of the well-known strains like this one can turn out to be a little disappointing.  My cautious attitude was completely unfounded.  I really loved it.  It was heady, potent and intoxicating.  It definitely felt like an indica, but had a little more energy to it than your average indica.  I could have easily stayed on the couch all evening, but then again I could have...”
“Great strain for melting away pain and stress but leaving you alert enough to still get things done.”

“A superb strain that I refer to as my knockout strain". This strain is my go to for evenings where I need to get to bed early and stay asleep throughout night. After a few inhalations I'll start feeling SUPER relaxed and within 40 minutes if I'm not in bed then I'm sleeping on the couch. I'd take that 40 minutes to listen to some Ravi Shankar and pet your cat. This strain is heavier for me
column4: but I like that it keeps ...”"

column3: “It elicits a pleasant, clear-headed high that helps me with my back pain and anxiety. Indica benefits without the heavy sedation.”

“A nice, solid indica. Pretty relaxing and lasts a decent amount of time. Also works as a great pain reliever - it helped me recover from a minor surgical procedure without any prescription painkillers. My only complaint is that it tends to make me less talkative than normal and I run the risk of getting really lost in my own thoughts, so it's not great for using with friends.”
“It elicits a pleasant, clear-headed high that helps me with my back pain and anxiety. Indica benefits without the heavy sedation.”

“A superb strain that I refer to as my knockout strain". This strain is my go to for evenings where I need to get to bed early and stay asleep throughout night. After a few inhalations I'll start feeling SUPER relaxed and within 40 minutes if I'm not in bed then I'm sleeping on the couch. I'd take that 40 minutes to listen to some Ravi Shankar and pet your cat. This strain is heavier for me
column4: but I like that it keeps ...”"

column3: “smoked this nightly during one stressy week. Smoking this felt like being lifted along on a little breeze, going for a twirl and coming back for a bit. gentle, but fun and relaxing experience. I loved falling asleep on this; those silly flights of creative fancy i get before i fall asleep became  comical.”

“Not the strongest, but a couple of bowls between me and my girlfriend did the trick. VERY sleepy though, not for daytime use. I got very very dry mouth, almost couldn't chew, but overall a fun and relaxing strain.”
“Local Product Of Colorado on 13th and Delaware has it, and wax, as I am medicating with it currently.”

“Probably one of my all-time if not favorite strains. Amazing head/body high, great for my pain and insomnia. This strain had a sweet pine like aroma with a very mellow hit almost no harshness. The taste was over the top on this particular grow. It was like smoking a camping trip in Alaska, sweet mossy undertones with what i could only describe as a wet earthy cold running creek smell and taste in addition to the tast...”

“Pretty good weed. I felt pretty paranoid after smoking it. It was snowing really hard out so I walked around at 3am playing the sax song from halo 3 ODST. If I had to give it a color to describe my feelings, it would be a dark blackish/grayish red.”
“It elicits a pleasant, clear-headed high that helps me with my back pain and anxiety. Indica benefits without the heavy sedation.”

“smoked this nightly during one stressy week. Smoking this felt like being lifted along on a little breeze, going for a twirl and coming back for a bit. gentle, but fun and relaxing experience. I loved falling asleep on this; those silly flights of creative fancy i get before i fall asleep became  comical.”

“This is one tasty smoke with sweet citrus pine with a earthy aspect, I smoked it down to the roach. The effects come on very smooth and slow compared to other strains that can be intense. A wave of relaxation slowly moves throughout your body putting you totally at ease. After a while you get a very mellow trippy psychedelic high to go with the total feeling of peace and contentment. Sitting back listening to music w...”

“Probably one of my all-time if not favorite strains. Amazing head/body high, great for my pain and insomnia. This strain had a sweet pine like aroma with a very mellow hit almost no harshness. The taste was over the top on this particular grow. It was like smoking a camping trip in Alaska, sweet mossy undertones with what i could only describe as a wet earthy cold running creek smell and taste in addition to the tast...”
“one of my favorites, very pleasant”
“delicious in everyway. Takes me back to the younger days.”

“Northern Lights is one of first strains I remember trying back in the early 90’s. A lovely flower that has very enjoyable easy-going effects. If you’re someone that is heavily into indicas, Northern Lights should most likely be one of your staples. An old friend, tried and true....this flowers a relaxing, appetite inducing indica.”

“Giving the #5 stars.  I haven't had it since I first had it in the mid to late 90's.  The first time I ever saw the number 5 strain. Was about ten pounds of it. It looked fake, so much wax/keef all over. It was not ideal for rolling joints unless you dried it out more.  This was purely one hit and quit stuff back then.  Good memories, good weed!”
“so tasty and hits you right away”
“Wow like goodness in my lungs so great. I love this for it's pure bliss and relaxation yet I still can move. And I need some little Debbie Swiss cake rolls so a little munchies”

“Northern Lights #5, Indica by Cresco, a Reserve ‘choice’, LLR cart. We know it, we love it, NL5 is a top-notch, heavy-hitting Indica standard. Myrcene, Terpinolene, Carophyllene and Limonene don’t have to work hard to grant you peace, calm, relaxation and happiness. 69.6 % THC, CBG and THCV along with notes of sweet, floral earth flirt with spicy pine makes Northern Lights #5 amazing!”

“Giving the #5 stars.  I haven't had it since I first had it in the mid to late 90's.  The first time I ever saw the number 5 strain. Was about ten pounds of it. It looked fake, so much wax/keef all over. It was not ideal for rolling joints unless you dried it out more.  This was purely one hit and quit stuff back then.  Good memories, good weed!”

“Northern Lights is one of first strains I remember trying back in the early 90’s. A lovely flower that has very enjoyable easy-going effects. If you’re someone that is heavily into indicas, Northern Lights should most likely be one of your staples. An old friend, tried and true....this flowers a relaxing, appetite inducing indica.”

“Very potent and smooth. Been growing for about 10 years and this is one of the best strain to grow if u are a begginer. I still grow a batch of this NL#5 so I have something good in the evening, wouldn't recommend as a mid day usage as you probably won't be too productive. Overall great strain, very stable and well renown. A must!”
“impressive very impressive”

“nice  light green color to it.tricomes are visible but not to bright.smokes like a dream in a pipe.its a chilln in bud for sure..not exactly like the original northern lights..it does not let you down..”
“finally got my hands on some of this super stoney goodness i love it for day tine use with my lower back pain has a very happy uplifting high instant favorite definitely for a seasoned patient”
“This is a great strain if you are looking for something that will help you run a marathon in bed ;)”
“Citrus, sweet and earthy dominant with mild taste. Good intense buzz. Had it in the end of the '90 in British-Columbia. Was and still is nice stuff.”

“Really good to use at home with my girlfriend in afternight or just to talk bullshits with friends.
Eyes and mouth dry...
munchies like hell...
a little bit sleepy after some time.
But awesome vibe.”
“This strain is the real deal... I haven't had NL's since the mid 90's. I'm so glad it's back!”
“Cool”
“Good taste. However, high did not last long at all, disappointed overall.”
“Overrated in my opinion.”
“Delicious. Earthy, uplifting and makes me feel happpppyyyyyyyy.  😁”
“Not a bad Indica.  Slight woody flavor via vaping.  Eventually will get you nice and relaxed.   however, it seemed to take extra herb to obtain the effect.”
“love the Wherkle!”
“I love this strain. I would smoke it every day if I could.”

“This is an all time potent classic. Piney citrus smell and warming body buzz are great. Type of stuff that puts a stupid smile on your face and there's no hiding how stoned you are. Will always be one of my favorite indicas.”
“delicious in everyway. Takes me back to the younger days.”
“one of my favorites, very pleasant”

“Really lovely strain. Smoke this every time I go to the Netherlands. A lot of strains get boring/repetitive but this one never disappoints me! 

The smell is nice. You can definitely notice something earthy about it, maybe the citrus if you have a good nose. 

The smoking experience is pleasant. Mellow in the throat and noticeable flavours. Really has something different to it compared to other strains. 

The effects...”
“Nice, classic indica effects. Piney flavor. Mellow relaxing and feel good high.”
“So relaxed, so happy, so high. Love this strain. Definitely calmed me down been stressed a lot lately. Home grown as well”

“Fights depression well, but sour grape is probably better.  Not super long lasting.  Doesn't come down well, seems to be one that guarantees I'll find something else to vape when it wears off.

Arousal comes on fast though, which is a nice thing for it to do.”
“nice classic indica! not too strong, but not week either”

“An amazing strain! Puts you right were you wanna be. Really powerful for me though. If I smoke to much I get greened out really fast, but other then that it's a solid strain and worth the little extra money!!”
“one of the best. smell and taste are fantástic.”

“It has that classic crisp taste that is really nostalgic. Surprisingly smooth inhale and a great exhale. so far a really relaxing high that i can feel in my face a few mins after smoking. Overall i enjoyed the smoke”

“This is one spectacular strain. Once smoked I usually get in bed, on my laptop and start writing. This strain offers a very sweet mellow high that allows you to sink comfortably into your chair. When smoked outside this strain makes the night sky dance wondrously as the stars and moon glow above you.”

“Very sticky buds! When I purchase my medical cannabis I prefer my strains more sticky so my budtender" told me pure indica would help my pain and fall asleep. Writing this now with a full body high and muscles relaxed I'm ready to get good sleep
column4: haven't slept well. Very mild to inhale not harsh
column5: more body high than head high
column6: almost at couch locked position. Lol”"

column3: “Loven the N lights #5 . Many times smoked it and hit the trails for a midnight run. Just a classic strain!”
“A number1”
“Holy fuckkk I have never been this high in my life. Best bud I've had in awhile. Took me like an hour to type this”
“A very smooth and flavorful toke. Perfect for those with sensitive lungs like myself.”

“Northern Lights is a legendary strain lineage, but #5 is a show stopper. Improved taste, improved resin production, easier to grow and even more enjoyable then it's predecessors. It's citrus and woody taste mixed with the incredible body stone are what set it apart.
Excellent for a night smoke, but still great doing the day if you are not doing anything really serious. This is one of my all-time favorite strain.”

“super easy to grow. first ever grow tested out at 22%. Heavy feeder, responds well to lots of pruning by making heavier and heavier resin. 
it smokes nicely. nothing gets done for a couple hours while you sit back and just grin like an idiot.”
“very good day round strain.  nice pain relief and probably one of the sweeter hybrids I have enjoyed.  the hybrid I had stated that it leaned towards the Indica side and I found this to be true!”
“Lasted 4 hours after smokin 4 bowls. Tingly, zoned out, relaxing grass. Definitely a stronger cerebral high than a body high.”
“good and non agressive weed”
“one of my all time faves. you cant go wrong with this strain.”

“Had this strain in a really stable shatter form(bho). Super tasty and the high is just as expected. Wonderfully relaxing and potent. Its a classic indica powerhouse. 
When its in shatter form, its really amazing. 100% recommend.

Also STR8 TERPS DAMN”

“This Strain is Fantastic for my Over Focused-ADHD/OCD. It melts away my pain allowing my mind to come to full focus while keeping my wits sharp as a tack. There isn't much more to say apart from, I think this is what Normal feels like....”
“helps so much with anxiety and loss of appetite... also keeps its full flavor till the last puff!”
“i feel like squidward in space”

“A very nice smoke and good nighttime strain ...heavy eyelids and TV is more interesting than it should be....I find it a nice smooth buzz with some laughs thrown in as well.....I would buy it again yup👍👏🏽🗣👽😎🐋🐠🐢🌻🇯🇲🍄🐓👾🤖🦄🐼🐔🐥🐮🐙🐸🐲☘🌞🌽🌶🧀🍍🍅🍓🍊🍋🍹⚓️🌠🗿”

“The Hobbits thought they were sharing the finest weed in south farthing with Ghandalf, but what they didn't know is that Ghandalf kept something even better for himself, and that was NORTHERN LIGHTS #5. 

What more could anyone want besides a well brought up batch of this luxurious smoke? I don't care if you're a Sativa or Indica person, everyone who enjoys smoking Cannabis flower MUST TRY THIS STRAIN. 

Smells like ...”

“After the first hit I noticed a shift in time everything was slowing down and I was moving really fast. A deeper sense of breath, calm relaxation over my body, very sweet and berry smell/ taste. Reminds me of the effects of another b;ueberry very very strong body but hyper and uplifting attitude different heavy body effects could either be an 8 or a 0, not a fan but I'm going to give this an 8.2 the best of the best ...”

“Nice earthy taste, with a slight hint of citrus. Made me very relax and yet somewhat wanting to do something. 
This for me would be a good after work strain.”
“this is my favorite of all weeds just a good price and taste with a very solid high its very stinky and sticky good show weed to and at 5 a g god I'm in love”

“Just like regular Northern Lights, this one helps me with severe neuropathy and get out of bed. Also gets my creative juices flowing for when I'm in front of my easel painting. My favorite strain too!”
“My first taste of this classic strain. It did not disappoint. Strong stone and great flavor. Relaxed and happy, but not too much couch lock. Perfect for a lazy afternoon.”

“Full disclosure, I've always loved this strain, so I may be a bit biased.  I picked this up at a local San Diego dispensary.  It tested at 28.39% THC, 0.00% CBD, and 0.05% CBN.

This batch certainly had bag appeal – look, smell, and feel were all there – and it did not disappoint.  It was a bit darker of a light green, if that makes sense – an army green.  Good looking structure, a fair amount of orange hairs and a d...”

“This is a book reader. I don't mean that as a negative. Calm, understanding, patient, apreciative. Not for parties. Fantastic if you want to just fucking relax. I feel really satisfied and in the moment.”
“Lovely balanced high. Feel it creeping up the back of your head and settling behind your eyes. Nice flavor in a vaporizer.”
“An excellent bud. Really potent smell and great taste, the high lasts a good 2hrs til the stone comes in. One of the better buds I've had in a long while..”

“Great to chill and laugh a little. You don't want to move your body because it's so relaxed, but at the same time you can use all your sences, you can still know what's happening around. Very relaxing but still awake!!”
“One of my favorite Indica strains of all time, such a classic”
“I just got to try this one out yesterday. It's an all around fantastic strain. Fucks you up quite well.”
“A very smoooogh high!”
“Powerful, great flavour and effect”

“This was a good strain, not my best but it was good. It lasted a while, but then again I had at least 2 or 3 grams of it and enough to pass around so it might just be that I had allot of it. All in all, it made me happy and I had a distinctive feeling of Euphoria and I asked the group that I was smoking with and I got mixed results but there is how I felt.”
“It's an almost instant comfort of mind and body expanding high. Allows one to feel relaxed and uplifted. Great Indica.”
“I love this strain in the PM it gets me really stoned - the best is at Sticky's in Hazel Dell by the winco”
“One of my favorite strains. I would say that this is the meat and potatoes of the weed universe.”
“Their is nothing better than some good lights man that shit had me seeing lights was a very good buzz and made me feel nice”

“IT was around 99. We are all at a table in a real nice town home complex in the northeastern US.  The table has a random collection of items.  Taboo the board game, a metal bowl, some nachos and dipping sauce, some playing cards, old Nextel phones we all used for 2 way, a few PS1 controllers, a dugout and its one hitter, a grinder, utensils, and (most importantly) Northern Lights #5.  Now, please forgive me for not u...”
“This has the best cerebral high great for headaches and back pains.”
“i feel like squidward in space”

“Very smooth and gives this very slow mood and kind of root you to the ground and don't go to the head, but it's sativa so it shouldn't. Really good strain when want to take super chill and stay still! :)”
“nice mellow high,strong”
“Not sure if this was the same strain but this northern lights I got from RHC almost has a blue dream type of smell. Higher on the Sativa side”

“By far, the best strain I have ever had the pleasure to combust. I'd equate it to the sticky dick-cheese of Hendrix. Hands down, a true winner. If you're looking for something to positively blast your mind, look no further.”
“seemed a little weak compared to other northern lights strains i've used”
“good shit !!!!!”
“http://www.evolvebeauty.co.uk/”
